article_text: No doubt the tide has turned on the South Florida luxury real-estate market. Just look at downtown Miami, Brickell, Wynwood and Midtown. Once again, the state bird is quickly becoming the construction crane.

article_metadata.title: Affordable housing for all | Miami Herald

article_summary:
Just look at downtown Miami, Brickell, Wynwood and Midtown.
No doubt the tide has turned on the South Florida luxury real-estate market.
Once again, the state bird is quickly becoming the construction crane.
